籤詩版本二:
Mu onwem nādi gi ka i ghara iju-aka n'aka-ya: Ọ nēfe dika kère, b͕a kwa gi àkú nzuzo.
Ị gaa chịkọta nkụ, agwọ dịkwa n’ime ahịhịa, nsi nwere ike taa gị, obi ga-eru gị ala.
詩意:
Hexagram a bụ ihe ịrịba ama nke ịnọ na nchekwa na idobe onwe gị.
Kpachara anya n'ihe niile.
解曰: Mechie ọnụ gị jide ezé gị. Ọ na-akpachapụghị anya. Ọ bụrụ na obi na-ama gị ikpe. N'ikpeazụ ọ na-emerụ onwe ya ahụ.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Nzukọ chessboard
Emperor Taizong nke Tang Dynasty na-aga n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ ma ọnyà na Suoyang City Cheng Yaojin laghachiri na Beijing ịrịọ maka nkwado.
E nyere Xue Dingshan iwu ka ọ jee ozi dị ka Marshal Ụzọ nke Abụọ wee gaa ịzọpụta Onyenwe anyị wee mee ka Xiliao dị jụụ.
Mgbe otu ndị mmadụ si na Yumen Pass pụta, ha bịarutere ugwu Qipan. N'ịbụ ndị ọtụtụ puku ndị agha nọchibidoro ya n'ugwu ahụ, Tang ọchịagha Luo Tong meriri Dou Yihu, eze ugwu ahụ, ọ dabara nke ọma, nwanne ya nwanyị Dou Xiantong bụ onye na-eso ụzọ nne Nsọ nke ifuru odo ma mara nkà ịgba ọsọ. jide eriri akụkọ ma kee Luo Tong, Xue Dingshan n'onwe ya duuru ndị agha ama ama.
(Abụ a bịanyere aka na ya kwekọrọ na nke a)
N'ịhụ ịma mma Xue Dingshan, Dou Xiantong chọrọ ịghọ enyi Feng Luan, ma Xue Dingshan jụrụ, Dou Xiantong were iwe ma chọọ ịchụpụ ya ma gbupụ ya isi. Ka oge na-aga, Dou Yihu durukwa ụmụnna Qipanshan laghachi na usoro ndị eze Tang iji nyere ndị eze Tang aka imeri Western Liao.
聖意: Nchebe ụlọ, ọdịmma onwe onye, ​​​​ịchọ akụ na ụba, ichere oge, nkwụsị azụmahịa, alụmdi na nwunye anaghị ekwe, Liujia mkpu ụgha, ndị na-agafe agafe na-egbochi ubi, silkworms, anụ ụlọ isii, ndị na-efu efu, igbochi ikpe ọha, ọnwụ (Mo Xing) Migration, conservative, ihe efu, ọrịa siri ike mgbake, ili ugwu, chioma
第X籤: Onye meriri lọtrị nke iri atọ na asaa
